      "professional_assessment": "Praised for its ergonomic design and solid build quality, the Spirit XT-2 is a reliable choice for gigging musicians and home players alike.",
      "customer_reviews": "Users appreciate its portability, unique look, and stable tuning. Some note the compact body takes getting used to, but overall satisfaction is high."
    },
    "en-GB": {

      "technical_analysis": "The headless design ensures tuning stability and easy transport. With 24 frets and dual Steinberger humbuckers, it delivers a wide range of tones. The DB-Tuner bridge allows for instant drop tuning.",
      "purchase_decision": "An excellent choice for bassists wanting a lightweight, portable instrument with professional-grade features at a reasonable price.",
      "usage_guidance": "Suitable for live gigs, studio sessions, and practice. The foldable leg rest adds comfort for seated playing.",
      "maintenance_care": "Wipe down after use, check hardware regularly, and store in a padded gig bag to protect the neck and body.",
      "professional_assessment": "Well-regarded for its ergonomic design and robust construction, the Spirit XT-2 is a dependable option for both gigging and home musicians.",
      "customer_reviews": "Players love its portability, distinctive appearance, and stable tuning. Some mention the compact body requires adjustment, but overall feedback is positive."
    },
    "es-ES": {
      "basic_info": "El Steinberger Spirit XT-2 Standard Bass HY es un bajo eléctrico moderno y sin clavijero, con cuerpo de tilo, mástil de arce de 3 piezas a través del cuerpo y diapasón de satinwood. Su diseño compacto y hardware innovador lo hacen ideal para escenario y estudio.",
      "technical_analysis": "El diseño sin clavijero ofrece gran estabilidad de afinación y portabilidad. El diapasón de 24 trastes y las dos pastillas humbucker Steinberger proporcionan una paleta tonal versátil. El puente DB-Tuner permite cambios rápidos de afinación.",

    "fr-FR": {
      "basic_info": "La Steinberger Spirit XT-2 Standard Bass HY est une basse électrique moderne sans tête, dotée d’un corps en tilleul, d’un manche traversant en érable 3 pièces et d’une touche en satinwood. Son design compact et son matériel innovant la rendent idéale pour la scène et le studio.",

      "purchase_decision": "Parfaite pour les bassistes recherchant un instrument léger, facile à transporter et doté de fonctionnalités professionnelles à un prix abordable.",

      "basic_info": "Die Steinberger Spirit XT-2 Standard Bass HY ist ein moderner, kopfloser E-Bass mit Basswood-Korpus, durchgehendem 3-teiligen Ahornhals und Satinwood-Griffbrett. Das kompakte Design und innovative Hardware machen ihn ideal für Bühne und Studio.",

      "basic_info": "La Steinberger Spirit XT-2 Standard Bass HY è un basso elettrico moderno senza paletta, con corpo in tiglio, manico neck-thru in acero a 3 pezzi e tastiera in satinwood. Il design compatto e l’hardware innovativo lo rendono ideale per palco e studio.",
      "technical_analysis": "Il design headless offre grande stabilità di accordatura e portabilità. La tastiera a 24 tasti e i due pickup humbucker Steinberger garantiscono una vasta gamma di suoni. Il ponte DB-Tuner consente cambi di accordatura rapidi.",

    "pt-PT": {
      "basic_info": "O Steinberger Spirit XT-2 Standard Bass HY é um baixo elétrico moderno sem cabeçote, com corpo em basswood, braço neck-thru de 3 peças em maple e escala em satinwood. O design compacto e hardware inovador tornam-no ideal para palco e estúdio.",
      "technical_analysis": "O design sem cabeçote oferece excelente estabilidade de afinação e portabilidade. A escala de 24 trastes e os dois captadores humbucker Steinberger proporcionam uma paleta tonal versátil. A ponte DB-Tuner permite mudanças rápidas de afinação.",
